name: Hot Summer Popsicle - Kids Cooking & Decorate Game
name_original: Hot Summer Popsicle - Kids Cooking & Decorate Game
description:
Have you ever want to make your own popsicles – refreshing fruit flavored ice pops that taste so good on a hot summer’s day? Cool treats make those summer days and nights at the beach even more fun, especially when you can decorate the frozen treats in cool, exciting ways! But now you don’t have to be a popsicle expert to make and design amazing sweet treats…with Hot Summer Popsicle – Kids Cooking & Decorate Game, you can finally make all the delicious cold desserts you’ve always wanted but never have!

First, decide what kind of popsicle you want to make! Select your favorite flavor from all the colors of the rainbow! It’s all up to you! Pretty cool, eh? Not just cool, it’s cold! Don’t worry…it won’t melt! Use the popsicle maker to design your chilly creations! Once you learn what kind of treat you want to make, you can design and decorate it exactly how you want! There are many decorations and colors to choose from…the possibilities are endless! Play Hot Summer Popsicle – Kids Cooking and Decorate Game, and discover how fun it can be to make your own ice-cold snacks for a lovely summer holiday!

FEATURES

- Make your own popsicles!

- Choose your favorite colors and flavors!

- Decorate your treats for hot summer days!


HOW TO PLAY

- Follow directions to select your favorite colors and flavors!

- Select decorations to create one-of-a-kind treats!

- Tons of options means hours of fun!
